name: Our Last Halloween: Chapter 1
description:
Runner-up in The Big Indie Pitch, February 2022, 'Our Last Halloween' is a stylized 2D mobile horror game that has you play as 3 teens attending a Halloween house party where they each encounter a different supernatural event, and you have to make choices and complete various minigames to learn more about the story and see if you can keep everyone alive until daybreak.

Chapter 1 was made over 1.5 months between June - July, 2021 as part of my MA in Games Design. I'm currently working on Chapter 2.

NOTE: the web version (above) sets the starting volume to zero, but this can be fixed in the settings. The save function also doesn't seem to work for the web version. Neither of these issues are in the Android version, so for the full experience, I'd recommend playing that if possible.

The game was mainly designed as a mobile game, and is available to play on Android from the Google Play store here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HamdosArtGames.OurLastHalloween
